"Raising your Power Level: Part 3": "One more way to raise your Power Level is to <yellow>release your equipment's Potentials<c>."

"You can release an item's Potential by selecting Release Potential from the Item Lab at the ARKS base in each region.

To release Potentials, you will need N-Meseta, as well as Gathering Materials, primarily Ores."

"To achieve a Power Level of 1100, aim to do all of the below:
・Reach Lv.15 with your Main Class
・Learn 12 Class Skills between your Main Class and your Sub Class

・Grind a ★1 weapon to +30
\u3000and release its Lv.2 Potential
・Grind a set of ★1 armor to +20
・Add a total of 11 Special Abilities to your weapons and armor"
